rf-analysis-engine documentation
================================

Welcome to the RF Analysis Engine (rfserver) one of the four inter-related application suite.
This application is responsible for creating a sqlite3 database on the user's local machine. It populates this database with dummy data.
The dummy data is taked from a real sensory device.
